definition: (of an audio device) to repeat a recorded phrase (e.g. for language learning)
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
comma/phrase marked by pause
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to return to the same school and repeat a course from which one has already graduated, as a result of failing to get good enough results to progress to one's desired higher-level school
to attend school on a temporary basis
to feel disheartened
unlucky
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
to prepare a lesson
lie/false words/nonsense/CL:篇[pian1]
to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
to no avail/of no use
vocational secondary school/technical secondary school/trade school/abbr. for 中等專科學校|中等专科学校
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
unexpected misfortune/unexpected accident/sudden death
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
to squander money/to spend extravagantly
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
